field.name: summary
field.value: Clean up more code in nvelocity

field.name: description
field.value:
use string.empty where appropriate
use "type" not "clazz", "claz" or "clas"
clean up some variable names
remove some unused code
remove some redundant casts
KeyedList removed as it is not used internally to nvelocity
more usage of generics
should not catch NullReferenceException
make some variable readonly
fix some spelling errors
use "as" and check for null is more efficient than "is" and then casting a second time
invert some "if"s to stop the negation of the condition
remove redundant contructors
clean up usings
